overview: 2011 release from the Hard Rock/AOR veterans fronted by vocalist David Coverdale. From its earliest Blues-based origins to the overwhelming MTV exposure in the ’90s, Whitesnake have captured audiences worldwide with their live shows, incredible songs and Coverdale’s signature vocals. Whitesnake have a global career total to date of selling 100+ million records.  Forevermore is the band’s 11th studio album, and was produced by Coverdale, guitarist Doug Aldrich and Michael McIntyre.  Limited Edition Box Set contains CD+LP+DVD+memorabilia (Poster, Lithography, Sticker).  DVD-1: Making Of Forevermore DVD-2: Forevermore: Track By Track DVD-3: Love Will Set You Free (Music Video) DVD-4: Making Of Love Will Set You Free
tagline: "Forevermore" is the 12th studio album by English Hard Rock band WHITESNAKE
title: Whitesnake: Forevermore
